posts.post_content:
guy wants 725 if this a fair price or if its to high what is fair price

thanks

Might be a little high, but not far off, any nicer and it's a four figure card. That being said, he is rarely offered in nicer grades. If you have been looking for a while perhaps buy it and if a nicer one comes along you should not have a problem selling the one shown.
